name: Visual Studio Source Browser Information File
summary: Learn about .BSC files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: BSC files used for browsing source code symbols. They are also used byVisual Studio's IntelliSense code auto-completion feature.

description: Symbol information file generated by Visual Studio, an SDK developed by Microsoft; contains information about symbols in the application, which were generated through an intermediate .SBR file from the original source code.
